alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued March 13 at 10:00AM EDT until March 15 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding and splash-over is possible. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 AM 9.5 0.7 1.1 5 None 13/04 PM 9.6 0.8 2.2 5 None 14/05 AM 10.9 2.1 2.6 6-8 None 14/05 PM 10.7 1.9 3.6 14-16 None 15/05 AM 11.0 2.2 3.0 10-12 None 15/06 PM 9.4 0.6 2.5 8-10 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 AM 9.9 0.4 1.2 2 None 13/04 PM 10.1 0.6 2.4 3-4 None 14/04 AM 11.3 1.8 2.7 6-8 Minor 14/05 PM 11.2 1.7 3.8 14-17 Minor 15/05 AM 11.7 2.2 3.2 11-12 Minor 15/06 PM 9.9 0.4 2.7 8-10 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 AM 10.4 0.7 1.0 1 None 13/04 PM 10.5 0.8 2.1 1 None 14/04 AM 11.9 2.2 2.4 1 None 14/05 PM 11.6 1.9 3.5 1 None 15/05 AM 12.2 2.5 2.8 1 Minor 15/06 PM 10.1 0.4 2.2 1-2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
